questions.question: 1. ________ technique is used to study current - spike frequency relationship in order to understand membrane properties.:

answers.c: Both Voltage clamp and Current clamp

questions.question: 2. __________ drug is used as sodium ion channel blocker for calculating reverse potential which is created because of the flow of Na+ ions.:
3. Current - frequency graph plots ______ on x-axis and _______ on y-axis:
4. In electrophysiology current - spike frequency plots are are mainly used to study _______________.:

answers.a: Reversal potential and conductance of ion channels

questions.question: 5. when the amplitude of injected current is increases as response from the cell, a) the first spike latency increases and b) the number of spikes increases:
